ModMetaData.name: Sun Lamp Auto-Basins
ModMetaData.author: 1trickPwnyta
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds a button to auto-place hydroponic blueprints around a sun lamp that maximizes the benefit of the lit area.
=== Formerly known as Sun Lamp Honesty === Before the sun lamp light radius bug was fixed, sun lamps as of the release of 1.5 produced more brightly lit (100%) area than intended. This mod increased the drawn light radius to match.
=== Updates === 05/24/2024: Change the name of the mod, remove functionality related to sun lamp light radius bug that has now been fixed.
